dict.string: You can now dismiss blackout via the lock button
Fixed a bug where OLED / Blackout would would appear again the device has been woken up and blackout already dismissed
Fixed a bug where Face ID would scan while OLED mode was enabled & running.
Added an option to delay oled / blackout presentation. You can now see the notification before OLED mode is displayed
Added an option to loop on the homescreen
I've reorganized the settings a little bit to make it a little cleaner
I've added some new animations (Ping, Drop, Bell, and Beam) I made back when I was trying to run a Patreon page, but that was too much work ;)
You can now change the aspect ratio from fit to fill
This should make sure you have either nepeta's libcolorpicker fork, or the original from bigboss.
This is the new change log, which works independently of package manager. This is where I'll tell you what I did in this version!
Pause the FaceID scan while the animation is being displayed in OLED/Blackout
Added an option to show the animation while in DND
